questionsData.title: A pH is an indicator to measure pH values.
Heating the solid gives the particles less energy.
There is a lot of sounds in outer space.
Vaccination helps to prevent infection by the same disease.
questionsData.explain_answer:
Vaccines work by exposing your body to a weakened or inactive form of a virus or bacteria. This triggers your immune system to develop antibodies that can fight off the real disease if you encounter it later. 

diseases are spread by germs.and vaccination using a very weak form of the disease could lead to immunity.

questionsData.title: Road-signs can be found in only one certain shape.
Camels and llamas are from the same family.
Wind turbines are turbines that provide food.
Driving license is a kind of informal permission to drive.
questionsData.explain_answer: Driving license is a kind of official permission to drive.

questionsData.title: Life-guard is someone who plays sport.
The stem of the word is the part that is common to all forms.
Place and put are antonyms.
questionsData.explain_answer:
Place" and "put" are generally considered synonyms.

Example:

  • Place: "Place the jewelry in the jewelry box." (refers to care)

  • Put: "Put the jewelry on the nightstand." (does not refer to care)

questionsData.title: Chatting is to talk in an informal way.
To get closer is to get nearer to something.
The text is mainly talking about…….
questionsData.article: Science is one of mankind’s most successful inventions. It owes its success to the fact that it is cumulative. Every new piece of information, every new piece of knowledge, every (useful 2) application contributes to a growing wealth of knowledge. Scientists can study any different phenomena, but by working within recognized framework, (they 3) can share their findings. Physicist Ernest Rutherford is reported to have said “If you want to find a really solid piece of physics, hypothesize a lot.” The best way to go about it is to start with a clue, from a preliminary hypothesis, and then try to test it. Experience has shown that good scientists are not afraid of rejecting hypothesis they once believed to be correct when better ones emerge. For many people the core of science is technological progress, and scientists are considered heroes when their (discoveries 1) lead to new devices and medicine. The function of science is to find out how things are put together.

questionsData.title: Which of the following is a compound word?
Education is essential in our life. The word "Education" is a / an ……
To change the word "weak" into a noun we add the suffix ……
The climate is getting worse and ……
That is the teacher ……daughter is a doctor.
……. it was raining, we went for a walk.
When the teacher entered the class, the students stood ……
She …… her work an hour ago.
questionsData.explain_answer:
The sentence "She did her work an hour ago" is in the past simple tense. In this tense, the verb "do" is in the past form (did) .

while both "did" and "didn't" are grammatically correct in this situation, "did" is the more concise and natural choice for a positive past tense statement.

questionsData.title: They …… to buy a new house next month.
While we …..., we saw a snake.
questionsData.explain_answer: The structure "while + past continuous" is often used in combination with the past simple tense to express two  actions in the past.

questionsData.title: These apples …… yesterday, so they are fresh.
Have your son ……shopping for you.
questionsData.explain_answer:
Use of have/get + infinitive

You use these verbs to replace other instruction words such as ask, tell or order.

Example:

Ask the boy to put away his bag.
→    Have the boy put away his bag.
→    Get the boy to put away his bag.
Note: With have, the infinitive is without to.
